original: @100a ` // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @100a ` // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: kshi ra s'a dha na /
analyzed: kshi ra s'a dha na /
translated: Kṣīrasādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'o ma sgrub pa'i thabs /
analyzed: 'o ma sgrub pa'i thabs /
translated: The method of accomplishing milk

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrasattva.

original: rgyal mtshan ngos ldan de nas blta //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan ngos ldan de nas blta //
translated: Then, look at the flag's side,

original: de la 'o ma rab tu sgrub //
analyzed: de la 'o ma rab tu sgrub //
translated: there, accomplish the milk.

original: 'o ma goms pa'i sems nyid kyis //
analyzed: 'o ma goms pa'i sems nyid kyis //
translated: By the mind accustomed to milk,

original: phyag @100b rgya chen po rab tu bsgrub //
analyzed: phyag @100b rgya chen po rab tu bsgrub //
translated: accomplish the great seal.

original: rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa rigs su byung ba'i bud med phyi dang nang gi yon tan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa rigs su byung ba'i bud med phyi dang nang gi yon tan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: A woman born into the family of Vajravārāhī and so forth, adorned with outer and inner qualities,

original: rnal 'byor pa ye shes cung zad dbang bas bzung ste //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ye shes cung zad dbang bas bzung ste //
translated: is taken by the yogī with a little bit of gnosis.

original: legs par 'grus shing dri zhim pos byugs la rgyan ma lus pas brgyan te /
analyzed: legs par 'grus shing dri zhim pos byugs la rgyan ma lus pas brgyan te /
translated: Well-endowed, anointed with fragrance, adorned with all ornaments,

original: de nas bdag med pa sngon du song bas /
analyzed: de nas bdag med pa sngon du song bas /
translated: then, having gone before the selflessness,

original: sa bon gyi yi ge sa dang rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje phag mor bsams te //
analyzed: sa bon gyi yi ge sa dang rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje phag mor bsams te //
translated: imagine Vajravārāhī arisen from the seed syllable and a vajra,

original: bdag nyid kyang rdo rje sems dpar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyang rdo rje sems dpar bya'o //
translated: and oneself as Vajrasattva.

original: de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i lus la dkyil 'khor lnga bsgoms te //
analyzed: de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i lus la dkyil 'khor lnga bsgoms te //
translated: Then, having meditated on the five maṇḍalas in the body of one's consort,

original: de'i gsang ba'i bha ga hr'i: las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i gsang ba'i bha ga hr'i: las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
translated: Her secret bhaga is an eight-petaled lotus from hrīḥ.

original: lte ba brum las mu tig lta bu'o //
analyzed: lte ba brum las mu tig lta bu'o //
translated: The center is a pearl from bhrūṃ.

original: bdag nyid kyi gsang pa yang h'um las rtse lnga pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi gsang pa yang h'um las rtse lnga pa'o //
translated: My own secret is a five-pointed vajra from hūṃ.

original: nor bu'i yi ge aom las so //
analyzed: nor bu'i yi ge aom las so //
translated: The syllable oṃ is in the jewel.

original: yi ge phat ser po bu gar ro //
analyzed: yi ge phat ser po bu gar ro //
translated: The yellow syllable phaṭ is in the hole.

original: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Then, with “oṃ sarvatathāgata anurāgaṇavajrasvabhāvatāṃ om,”

original: zhes pas snyoms par 'jug ste /
analyzed: zhes pas snyoms par 'jug ste /
translated: one enters into union.

original: sen mos gdab pa byas la /
analyzed: sen mos gdab pa byas la /
translated: One should scratch with the fingernails.

original: myos byed kyi lag pas yang dang yang du brud cing lce rtse'i thur mas yang yang /
analyzed: myos byed kyi lag pas yang dang yang du brud cing lce rtse'i thur mas yang yang /
translated: Again and again, one should rub with the wine hand and again and again with the tip of the tongue.

original: de nas sa gsum gyi dbang phyug ma rgyas pa nas sngar bshad pa'i sngags kyis snyoms par zhugs te /
analyzed: de nas sa gsum gyi dbang phyug ma rgyas pa nas sngar bshad pa'i sngags kyis snyoms par zhugs te /
translated: Then, with the expanded goddess of the three places, as previously explained, one enters into union.

original: dal bus dal bus bskyod pa na 'o ma 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dal bus dal bus bskyod pa na 'o ma 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: When one moves slowly and slowly, milk flows.

original: babs pa na yi ge phat kyis bsdams te /
analyzed: babs pa na yi ge phat kyis bsdams te /
translated: When it flows, one should block it with the syllable phaṭ.

original: snang ba med pa la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: snang ba med pa la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: One should enter into nonappearance.

original: de ltar yang dang yang 'o ma 'bab pa goms pas ni ;
analyzed: de ltar yang dang yang 'o ma 'bab pa goms pas ni ;
translated: Thus, by the practice of the repeated flow of milk,

original: / skad cig la bab pa na snang ba med pa la skad cig la 'jug pa /
analyzed: / skad cig la bab pa na snang ba med pa la skad cig la 'jug pa /
translated: when it flows in an instant, one enters into the instant without appearance.

original: de'i tshe phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur te /
translated: At that time, one attains the power of the Great Seal.

original: ji ltar dpal mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje dra ba'i rtog pa las gsungs pa /🔽chu rgyus dra ba dang bcas shing //
analyzed: ji ltar dpal mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje dra ba'i rtog pa las gsungs pa / chu rgyus dra ba dang bcas shing //
translated: As it is said in the Tantra of the Vajra Web of the Glorious Dakini:🔽With the network of veins,

original: yan lag kun ldan pu ga can //
analyzed: yan lag kun ldan pu ga can //
translated: with all the limbs, with the orifices,

original: lus de med par sdang gyur pa //
analyzed: lus de med par sdang gyur pa //
translated: without that body, one becomes angry.

original: de yi skad cig de la ni //
analyzed: de yi skad cig de la ni //
translated: In that instant,

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sku 'dzin 'gyur //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sku 'dzin 'gyur //
translated: one holds the body of Hevajra.

original: zhes so // 'di dgyes pa'i rdo rje ni mtshan pa ste //
analyzed: zhes so // 'di dgyes pa'i rdo rje ni mtshan pa ste //
translated: This is the name of Hevajra.

original: phyag rgya chen po grub pa'i tshul thams cad 'di ltar man ngag las shes so //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po grub pa'i tshul thams cad 'di ltar man ngag las shes so //
translated: All the methods of achieving the Great Seal should be known from the oral instructions in this way.

original: don 'di nyid dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pas kyang gsungs te /
analyzed: don 'di nyid dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pas kyang gsungs te /
translated: This very meaning is also taught in the Shri Guhyasamaja and so forth.

original: rdo rje nyi ma nub pa na //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma nub pa na //
translated: When the Vajra Sun has set,

original: sgrub ba kun du brtsam par bya //
analyzed: sgrub ba kun du brtsam par bya //
translated: one should begin all the practices.

original: skya rengs 'char ba'i dus dag tu //
analyzed: skya rengs 'char ba'i dus dag tu //
translated: At the time of the rising of the dawn,

original: 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
analyzed: 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
translated: There is no doubt about this accomplishment.🔽And:

original: ces pa dang / sor mo dang ni lce'i thur mas //
analyzed: ces pa dang / sor mo dang ni lce'i thur mas //
translated: With the finger and the tongue

original: yang nas yang du cung zad bskul //
analyzed: yang nas yang du cung zad bskul //
translated: stimulate again and again.

original: rtsa ni rnam par rgyas 'gyur te //
analyzed: rtsa ni rnam par rgyas 'gyur te //
translated: The channel will expand

original: mchog gcig pu ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mchog gcig pu ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: and the supreme will arise.

original: sngags pas @101a * //
analyzed: sngags pas @101a * //
translated: The mantrin

original: bar chad med par ni //
analyzed: bar chad med par ni //
translated: without interruption

original: sra ba cung zad cung zad bskul //
analyzed: sra ba cung zad cung zad bskul //
translated: stimulates a little bit at a time.

original: nor bur gnas pa yid las byung //
analyzed: nor bur gnas pa yid las byung //
translated: The mind-born one dwelling in the jewel

original: yi ge phat kyis bsdam par bya //
analyzed: yi ge phat kyis bsdam par bya //
translated: is bound with the syllable phaṭ.

original: byang chub sems ni ma shor na //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni ma shor na //
translated: If the bodhicitta does not fall,

original: bde ba dam pa skye ba ste //
analyzed: bde ba dam pa skye ba ste //
translated: supreme bliss arises.

original: de yi rang bzhin spros pa yis //
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin spros pa yis //
translated: By the nature of that proliferation,

original: mi lus chad pa med par snang //🔽khyab cing zhi la bde ba yis //
analyzed: mi lus chad pa med par snang // khyab cing zhi la bde ba yis //
translated: the human body appears without interruption.🔽The supreme state is definitely attained

original: go 'phang dam pa nges par thob //
analyzed: go 'phang dam pa nges par thob //
translated: by the bliss of pervading and pacifying.

original: byang chub sems ni shi ba ni //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni shi ba ni //
translated: The death of the bodhicitta

original: brgyal bas 'dir ni thob ma yin //
analyzed: brgyal bas 'dir ni thob ma yin //
translated: is not attained here by fainting.

original: zhes so // 'di lta bu'i bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa lam rnam pa gnyis las /
analyzed: zhes so // 'di lta bu'i bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa lam rnam pa gnyis las /
translated: Such activities are for the two types of yogins.

original: pho nya'i lam la dga' ba /
analyzed: pho nya'i lam la dga' ba /
translated: Those who delight in the path of the messenger🔽are the yogins of the creation stage.

original: de nyid kyi gsung dang thugs la dbang thob pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi gsung dang thugs la dbang thob pa /
translated: He has attained power over his speech and mind.

original: las dang po pa'i sa las 'das pa /
analyzed: las dang po pa'i sa las 'das pa /
translated: He has transcended the stage of a beginner.

original: ye shes la dbang thob pa dang / ye shes la yang dag par dbang thob pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: ye shes la dbang thob pa dang / ye shes la yang dag par dbang thob pa ma yin pa /
translated: He has attained power over wisdom, but not perfect power over wisdom.

original: ye shes la cung zad dbang bas spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes la cung zad dbang bas spyad par bya'o //
translated: He should practice with a little power over wisdom.

original: de las gzhan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not otherwise.

original: las dang po pa ni des nyams la /
analyzed: las dang po pa ni des nyams la /
translated: The beginner is impaired by that.

original: gsum pa dang bzhi pa ni de mi 'bad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsum pa dang bzhi pa ni de mi 'bad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The third and fourth are not diligent in that.

original: dpal krishna ya m'a ri'i rgyud las /
analyzed: dpal krishna ya m'a ri'i rgyud las /
translated: In the glorious Kṛiṣṇayamāri Tantra,

original: 'o ma sgrub pa'i man ngag tu byas la /
analyzed: 'o ma sgrub pa'i man ngag tu byas la /
translated: it is made into an esoteric instruction for accomplishing milk.

original: a'a tsarya dzi mu da b'a t'a las mdzad pa /
analyzed: a'a tsarya dzi mu da b'a t'a las mdzad pa /
translated: It was composed by Ācārya Jīvadatta.

original: 'o ma sgrub pa'i man ngag rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'o ma sgrub pa'i man ngag rdzogs so /
translated: The esoteric instruction for accomplishing milk is complete.

original: // / a'a ts'arya badzra p'a ni dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: // / a'a ts'arya badzra p'a ni dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o /
translated: By Ācārya Vajrapāṇi and the translator, the monk Dharmaśrījñāna.
